Description: Variegated limestone, cream with grey slashes, bag-shaped vase, with horizontally pierced tubular handles on the sides, the contracted mouth is surrounded by an everted ledge-rim.
Curator's comments: Published: A. Roveri and F. Tiradritte [eds.], Kemet: Alle Sorgenti del Tempo, Ravenna 1998, p.208-209 [168].
Condition: good (rim chipped and exterior worn in places)
